label: TV_Sc
text: power_ir@outlook.com Send us email for support. www.powerir.net Visit the website for instructions. Save and use this TV code Insert the frequency (Hz).Standard is 38000 Hz.Sony use 40000 RCA use 57600 Philips use 36000. Send current TV IR code TV Scanner Reset Auto TV Scanner Stop Auto TV Scanner Start Fast Auto TV Scanner Start TV Scanner Manual - TV Scanner Manual -10 TV Scanner Manual +10 TV Scanner Manual + Press repeatedly the scanner button until your TV turn on.You can find this TV number code into scrollable pop up list or send us by email the brand namemodel and the increment number code.We will send you the IR numbers strings to setup My Remote TV manually. TV Scanner

Save and use this Cable code. frequencyB Insert the frequency (Hz).Standard freq for most brands is 38000 Hz.Sony use 40000 RCA use 57600. text: power_ir@outlook.com Support email. www.powerir.net Support website for instructions. Feedback Email A/C Press repeatedly and slowly the scanner button until your A/C turn on.Send by email the brand name and the increment number.We will send you back the IR codes to setup My Remote A/C. Other6 A/C Scanner Other5 A/C Scanner Other4 A/C Scanner Other3 A/C Scanner Other2 A/C Scanner Other1 A/C Scanner Klimatair-Toyo A/C Scanner Whirlpool-York A/C Scanner Trane A/C Scanner Toshiba A/C Scanner Sharp A/C Scanner Sanyo A/C Scanner Samsung A/C Scanner Panasonic A/C Scanner Mitsubishi A/C Scanner LG A/C Scanner Hyundai A/C Scanner Hitachi A/C Scanner Haier A/C Scanner Fujitsu A/C Scanner Daikin A/C Scanner Gree A/C Scanner Changhong A/C Scanner Carrier A/C Scanner Press repeatedly and slowly the scanner button until your A/C turn on.Send by email the brand name and the increment number.We will send you back the IR codes to setup My Remote A/C. Scroll down to find your A/C Scanner. power_ir@outlook.com Support email. www.powerir.net Support website for instructions.

label: MyTVed
text: power_ir@outlook.com You can send us email for support. You can operate now from My Remote TV GUI or Voice. Visit the website read about the Power IR find the IR database link login find your device codeset.Copy paste the IR numbers strings into the upper edit text box ( delete first the default example IR string ) delete the 11 from string and save.Put only the numbers and commas like the example format.Do not leave spaces for decimal format IR codes. www.powerir.net Save the IR codes IRTVguide1 Insert IR code string for Guide command. IRTVlast1 Insert IR code string for Last command. IRTVyellow1 Insert IR code string for Yellow command. IRTVred1 Insert IR code string for Red command. IRTVgreen1 Insert IR code string for Green command. IRTVblue1 Insert IR code string for Blue command. IRTVskipforward1 Insert IR code string for Skip forward command. IRTVskipback1 Insert IR code string for Skip back command. IRTVrewind1 Insert IR code string for Rewind command. IRTVfastforward1 Insert IR code string for Fast Forward command. IRTVrecord1 Insert IR code string for Record command. IRTVStop1 Insert IR code string for stop command. IRTVPause1 Insert IR code string for pause command. IRTVPlay1 Insert IR code string for play command. IRTVenter Insert IR code string for Enter command. IRTVClear Insert IR code string for Clear command. IRTVInfo Insert IR code string for Info command. IRTVRight1 Insert IR code string for Right command. IRTVLeft1 Insert IR code string for Left command. IRTVDown1 Insert IR code string for Down command. IRTVUp1 Insert IR code string for Up command. IRTVOK1 Insert IR code string for OK command. IRTVN0 Insert IR code string for num 0 command. IRTVN9 Insert IR code string for num 9 command. IRTVN8 Insert IR code string for num 8 command. IRTVN7 Insert IR code string for num 7 command. IRTVN6 Insert IR code string for num 6 command. IRTVN5 Insert IR code string for num 5 command. IRTVN4 Insert IR code string for num 4 command. IRTVN3 Insert IR code string for num 3 command. IRTVN2 Insert IR code string for num 2 command. IRTVN1 Insert IR code string for num 1 command. IRTV7 Insert IR code string for power off command. IRTVExit Insert IR code string for Exit command. IRTV6b Insert IR code string for Menu command. IRTV6 Insert IR code string for AV/TV command. IRTV5m Insert IR code string for Mute. IRTV5 Insert IR code string for Volume down command. IRTV4 Insert IR code string for Volume up command. IRTV3 Insert IR code string for Channel down command. IRTV2 Insert IR code string for Channel up command. IRTV1 Insert IR code string for Power command. www.superir.net Visit the website for instructions to setup it.The default IR codes are for Samsung TV.
